attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TV Licencing should be scrapped all together. Why should the UK public continue to pay for something, that they don't watch any BBC programes on principal.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition already up which you may prefer to sign.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bbcsubscription/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
